title: Review a Restaurant
description: A food critic has visited a new restaurant and needs to write a review, balancing description of the food, atmosphere, and service.

tasks.description: Consult notes taken during the restaurant visit about each dish, the decor, and the service.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has all the raw material for the review.

tasks.description: Draft the review, using vivid and descriptive language to describe the flavors and textures of the food.
tasks.expected_outcome: The review makes the reader feel like they can taste the food.

tasks.description: Conclude with a clear recommendation and a star rating, consistent with the publication's rating system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The review provides a clear, final judgment for the reader.
